item.title: Poetry
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Well, imagery is where you use words to try and build a picture. I kind of confuse it with ‘descriptive writing’ though or whatever, so don’t take my word for it.

Read full topic
